required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Retrospective, Observational Study on the Effectiveness of Daclatasvir-Containing Regimens in Patients in KSA, UAE and Qatar
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of Daclatasvir-Containing Regimens in Patients Treated in Real-Life Setting in Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA), United Arab Emirates (UAE) and Qatar

brief_summary.textblock: The study will provide safety and efficacy information among patients receiving daclatasvir. It will describe daclatasvir prescribing patterns and provide a clinical profile of patients receiving the treatment in KSA, UAE, and Qatar.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants achieving sustained virological response 12 weeks post-treatment (SVR12)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study treatment
primary_outcome.description: Patients will be considered to have achieved SVR12 if they have a documented undetectable viral load on or after Week 12 following the end of treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of SVR12 by Treatment Regimen
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as any daclatasvir containing regimen. Subgroups include: daclatasvir + sofosbuvir; daclatasvir + sofosbuvir + RBV; daclatasvir + simeprevir; daclatasvir + simeprevir + ribavirin.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as the country where treatment with a daclatasvir containing regimen was initiated. Subgroups include Saudi Arabia, UAE, and Qatar.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of SVR12 by HCV-Treatment Experience
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Subgroups include patients in which prior treatment with IFN and RBV has failed; prior treatment with IFN, RBV and telaprevir or boceprevir has failed; previous treatment with IFN, RBV and simeprevir has failed; previous treatment with sofosbuvir and RBV has failed.

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of SVR12 by HIV co-infection
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Subgroup defined as HIV diagnosis prior to the initiation of daclatasvir containing regimen.

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of SVR12 by previous liver transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Subgroup defined by patients undergoing a liver transplant for any cause prior to the initiation of a daclatasvir containing regimen
Measured by number of patients reporting SAEs

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Adverse Events leading to discontinuation
secondary_outcome.description: Measured by number of patients reporting AEs that result in treatment discontinuation

arm_group.arm_group_label: daclatasvir patients in KSA, UAE, and Qatar
arm_group.description: patients treated with daclatasvir-containing regimens in KSA, UAE, and Qatar

intervention.arm_group_label: daclatasvir patients in KSA, UAE, and Qatar

study_pop.textblock: The study will enroll all patients initiating a new daclatasvir-containing HCV treatment, regardless of treatment history and previous treatment response from availability of the drug on country markets up to 01-Oct-2015.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients greater than or equal to 18 years of age
- Diagnosed with chronic hepatitis C
- Ended treatment with daclatasvir-containing regimen no later than 01-Oct-2015
Exclusion Criteria:
- Use of a daclatasvir-containing regimen in a clinical trial setting
Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply
